trans-unit.source: Keyboard
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤

trans-unit.source: Enables the macOS touchbar buttons on the keyboard if available.
trans-unit.target: 啟用鍵盤上的 macOS 觸摸板按鈕 (如果可用)。

trans-unit.source: A set of identifiers for entries in the touchbar that should not show up (for example `workbench.action.navigateBack`.
trans-unit.target: 觸控列中一組不應顯示的項目識別碼 (例如 `workbench.action.navigateBack`)。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write because the keybindings configuration file is dirty. Please save it first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為按鍵繫結關係組態檔已變更，所以無法寫入。請先儲存，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to the keybindings configuration file. Please open it to correct errors/warnings in the file and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入按鍵繫結關係組態檔。請開啟檔案修正錯誤/警示並再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to the keybindings configuration file. It has an object which is not of type Array. Please open the file to clean up and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入按鍵繫結關係組態檔。其具有類型非 Array 的物件。請開啟檔案予以清除並再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults
trans-unit.target: 將按鍵繫結關係放在此檔案中以覆寫預設

trans-unit.source: expected non-empty value.
trans-unit.target: 必須是非空白值。

trans-unit.source: property `{0}` is mandatory and must be of type `string`
trans-unit.target: 屬性 '{0}' 為強制項目且必須屬於 `string` 類型

trans-unit.source: property `{0}` can be omitted or must be of type `string`
trans-unit.target: 屬性 `{0}` 可以省略或必須屬於 `string` 類型

trans-unit.source: Identifier of the command to run when keybinding is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 觸發按鍵繫結關係時所要執行命令的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Arguments to pass to the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至命令加以執行的引數。

trans-unit.source: Key or key sequence (separate keys with plus-sign and sequences with space, e.g. Ctrl+O and Ctrl+L L for a chord).
trans-unit.target: 按鍵或按鍵順序 (以加號分隔按鍵，並以空格進行排序，例如: CTRL + O 和 CTRL + L，L 代表同步選取)。

trans-unit.source: Mac specific key or key sequence.
trans-unit.target: Mac 特定按鍵或按鍵順序。

trans-unit.source: Linux specific key or key sequence.
trans-unit.target: Linux 特定按鍵或按鍵順序。

trans-unit.source: Windows specific key or key sequence.
trans-unit.target: Windows 特定按鍵或按鍵順序。

trans-unit.source: Condition when the key is active.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵為使用中時的條件。

trans-unit.source: Contributes keybindings.
trans-unit.target: 提供按鍵繫結關係。

trans-unit.source: Invalid `contributes.{0}`: {1}
trans-unit.target: `contributes.{0}` 無效: {1}

trans-unit.source: Here are other available commands:
trans-unit.target: 其他可用命令如下:

trans-unit.source: Keybindings configuration
trans-unit.target: 按鍵繫結關係組態

trans-unit.source: Key or key sequence (separated by space)
trans-unit.target: 按鍵或按鍵順序 (以空格分隔)

trans-unit.source: Name of the command to execute
trans-unit.target: 所要執行命令的名稱

trans-unit.source: Condition when the key is active.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵為使用中時的條件。

trans-unit.source: Arguments to pass to the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至命令加以執行的引數。

trans-unit.source: Keyboard
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤

trans-unit.source: Controls the dispatching logic for key presses to use either `code` (recommended) or `keyCode`.
trans-unit.target: 控制按下按鍵時的分派邏輯 (使用 'code' (建議使用) 或 'keyCode')。
